name: Letters to Lucky
description:
A video game adaptation of a short story I wrote 5 years ago. The original short story can be read here.

Controls

  • WASD to move, Mouse to look  (there are objects that trigger narrative in the rooms, so remember to explore).
  • Press ‘E’ to interact write a letter
  • Once you begin writing the letter, you cannot go back to the room! (scene transitions to next scene once you complete the letter)
  • Objects on the letter are interactable with mouse and mouse drag
  • Press 'escape' to show the cursor
  • Use mouse to drag/click on interactable objects on in the letters.
  • WASD to move (there are objects that trigger narrative in the rooms, so remember to explore)
  • If you hit a trigger bug just try and back away from the object 😅
  • Press R at any point to reload the current scene
